input.sentences: we had a fun time playing today .
we had a lot of activities .
first we played with lots of balls .
then we invited all the other kids over .
afterwards we had a bunch of cake .
output.sentences: Lucy plays with her food more than she eats it.
But she's always ready to vogue for the camera.
And maybe, look a little crazy in the ball pit.
All her friends came over for the big day.
It's her favorite birthday to date!
